text: Andrea Radrizzani (born 10 September 1974) is an Italian businessman and the majority owner of Premier League club Leeds United.He's not yet the President of the italian Serie A club: U.S. Salernitana He is also the chairman and founder of the sports broadcasting group Eleven Sports. == Early life and education == Radrizzani was born in Rho, a metropolitan area of Milan. He graduated with a degree in public relations from IULM University in 1996. == References == Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Sports executives and administrators
title: Andrea Radrizzani
